content: With the Turtle Tear Soak equipped, when at full health, using the gourd recovers a moderate amount of mana.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Turtle_Tear.md', within the main section titled 'Turtle Tear'.
The content is as follows:
With the Turtle Tear Soak equipped, when at full health, using the gourd recovers a moderate amount of mana.
